sentences.english: Mexican navy kills top cartel kingpin in shootout.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥大毒枭在与海军交火中被打死。

sentences.english: Liu Guoxi was named as a drug kingpin in the Far Eastern Economic Review during the mid 90's.
sentences.chinese: 90年代中期，刘国玺曾被远东经济评论认定为毒枭。

sentences.english: The notorious drug - pusher has been contriving an escape from the prison.
sentences.chinese: 臭名昭著的大毒枭一直都在图谋越狱。

sentences.english: “The narco-mafia state is now completely consolidated, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “现在阿富汗已经彻底沦为毒枭的国度”，他说。

sentences.english: Mexico's ports and border-crossings have always been in dispute among the big players in the drugs business.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥的港口与边境口岸一直是大毒枭间的必争之地。

sentences.english: A court in the southern Chinese city of Guangzhou has sentenced a drug boss to death.
sentences.chinese: 中国南方广州市一家法院判处一名大毒枭死刑。

sentences.english: At the center of plot was the bad guy the drug lord Han super villain Woo Manchu.
sentences.chinese: 影片中一个重要人物是毒枭韩先生，片中的最大反派。

sentences.english: Gunbattles in Jamaican capital kill at least 30 .
sentences.chinese: 牙买加军警抓捕毒枭引发冲突至少30人死亡。

definition: bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
dark road/criminal ways/the underworld/see also 白道[bai2 dao4]
secret service/special service/secret service agent/special agent
(of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain
